item.title: Crypto Is Losing Its ‘Speculative Trade’ Label Among Retail Traders – Here’s What They’re Focused On Instead
item.description: An ongoing Stocktwits poll shows half of retail traders now view crypto as protection against currency and geopolitical risks.

item.title: Why Is One Stop Systems Stock Rising In Premarket Today?
item.description: The micro-cap company won a major order for video-surveillance systems in combat zones.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Eyes Another Day In The Green: What’s Powering It Premarket?

item.title: Nio Stock Rises Premarket: Chinese EV Maker Pushes Into Tesla Territory Down Under
item.description: The expansion adds two new right-hand drive markets to Nio’s global footprint.
